thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Turkcell FY 2017 Net Profit Up At 1.98 Bln Lira

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Turkcell FY 2017 Net Profit Up At 1.98 Bln Lira
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - TURKCELL:
* FY 2017 NET PROFIT OF 1.98 BILLION LIRA VERSUS 1.51 BILLION LIRA YEAR AGO
* FY 2017 REVENUE OF 17.03 BILLION LIRA VERSUS 14.1 BILLION LIRA YEAR AGO
* PROPOSES TO PAY TOTAL DIVIDEND AT NET 0.47889 LIRA PER SHARE FOR FY 2017
* EXPECTS EBITDA MARGIN AROUND 33 PCT - 35 PCT FOR FY 2018 YOY
* EXPECTS GROUP REVENUE GROWTH AROUND 13 PCT - 15 PCT FOR FY 2018‍​‍​‍ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
